mean_cn: v. 剽窃，抄袭（别人学说、著作）
mean_en: to use the words or ideas of another person as if they were your own words or ideas
word_etyma:
plagiar=plagiarism+ize [动词后缀], 表示“...化”、照...样子做、按...方式处理，变成...状态，使成为...，与名词后缀-ization相对应 → vi. 剽窃；抄袭
vt. 剽窃；抄袭
sentence: The student plagiarizes her test answers from her friend.
sentence_trans: 那个学生抄袭了她同学的考试答案。
